title: Werebaby

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Turn into the dreaded Baby on full moon nights. As a baby you will scare off visitors with your crying.
- You are also a normal person and can shoot people at any time. 3 uses because you forgot to go bullet shopping.
